name: magic-guard

effect.black-white: Paralysis cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the Speed cut is unaffected. Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.
effect.black-2-white-2: Paralysis cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the Speed cut is unaffected. Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.

short_effect: Protects against damage not directly caused by a move.

flavor_text.black-white: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
